title: Median Calculator: Find the Median of a Data Set Online | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Order the data: \(x_{(1)} \le x_{(2)} \le \dots \le x_{(n)}\) 2a. If n is odd: median = \(x_{(\frac{n+1}{2})}\) 2b. If n is even: median = \(\frac{x_{(\frac{n}{2})} + x_{(\frac{n}{2} + 1)}}{2}\) This calculator uses exactly this procedure.
